model.name: Messenger PM Voyager
model.disambiguatingDescription: Inspired by the vintage school bag, the Messenger PM Voyager is fashioned in supple Monogram Eclipse canvas, which makes it very comfortable to carry. With two buckles fastener, convenient adjustable shoulder strap, and numerous internal compartments, it is the perfect bag for the urban man on the move.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Monogram Eclipse canvas
  • Textile lining
  • Epi leather & textile trim
  • Silver coloured metallic pieces
  • Buckle fastener closure
  • External flat pocket
  • Internal zipped pocket
  • ストラップ：取り外し不可, 調整可能
  • ハンドル：シングル

The reference is either made in France, Spain, Italy or in the US.

panelInformations.title: Product Care
panelInformations.description:
• Be careful not to scratch or rub your product against abrasive surfaces, especially the leather trim.
  • Protect your product from humidity and keep it away from direct sources of heat, such as radiators and the inside of cars in summer.
  • Avoid contact with liquid, hand cream, hand sanitizer, make-up and perfume.
  • To clean it, gently wipe the coated canvas with a soft cloth with slightly soapy water, and the black leather trim with a soft, dry cloth.
  • The adherent surface, created with microscopic suction cups, can be reactivated. With usage, the adherent surface grip strength may naturally diminish. This can be easily resolved by wiping the surface gently with a water damp cloth and air dry completely for ten minutes before replacing mobile phone. Grip strength is fully restored and your phone will adhere perfectly again.
  • When not in use, store the item in the dust bag provided with your purchase. Do not store in high temperatures, high humidity or unventilated areas.

For any enquiries about your product, please do not hesitate to contact any Louis Vuitton store.
panelInformations.introduction: To preserve the beauty of your product, we recommend following these guidelines for its care:
